title: SPE Chapter 01 - Simple: Self-Rendering PHP 8.5 Application
description:
Chapter 01 of Simple PHP Engine - a complete web application in one statement using modern PHP 8.5 features.

This tutorial demonstrates the "echo new class" pattern: an anonymous class that instantiates and renders itself as HTML in a single expression. The entire request-response lifecycle‚Äîconstruction, processing, and output‚Äîoccurs atomically.

Key concepts covered:
‚Ä¢ The self-rendering object pattern (echo new class)
‚Ä¢ PHP 8.3 typed constants for type-safe defaults
‚Ä¢ PHP 8.4 asymmetric visibility (public private(set))
‚Ä¢ PHP 8.5 pipe operator for data transformation pipelines
‚Ä¢ First-class callables with spread syntax
‚Ä¢ Dynamic navigation from a single source of truth
‚Ä¢ Heredoc templates with variable interpolation
‚Ä¢ Zero-config dark mode via color-scheme meta tag
